## Title slide options {.smaller}

You have 6 options:

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
**Light:**

1.  Light green + buildings:

``` yaml
title-slide-attributes:
  data-background-color: white
  data-background-image:  _extensions/positconfslides/assets/backgrounds/toc-light.svg
```

2. Light maroon + buildings:

``` yaml
title-slide-attributes:
  data-background-color: white
  data-background-image:  _extensions/positconfslides/assets/backgrounds/toc2-light.svg
```

3.  Light + people:

``` yaml
title-slide-attributes:
  data-background-color: white
  data-background-image:  _extensions/positconfslides/assets/backgrounds/toc-people-light.svg
```
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
**Dark:**

4.  Dark green + buildings:

``` yaml
title-slide-attributes:
  data-background-color: black
  data-background-image:  _extensions/positconfslides/assets/backgrounds/toc-dark.svg
```

5.  Dark maroon + buildings:

``` yaml
title-slide-attributes:
  data-background-color: black
  data-background-image:  _extensions/positconfslides/assets/backgrounds/toc2-dark.svg
```

6.  Dark + people:

``` yaml
title-slide-attributes:
  data-background-color: black
  data-background-image:  _extensions/positconfslides/assets/backgrounds/toc-people-dark.svg
```
:::
